item.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 22, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
Sep 8, 11:11 UTC
Completed - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 08/09/2022 10:03 UTC
All Cisco ASA firewall have been deactivated.
All operation have been completed.

Sep 7, 09:58 UTC
Update - 100% of Cisco ASA firewall have been deactivated.
Some operation are still in progress.

Aug 31, 13:20 UTC
Update - 95% of Cisco ASA firewall have been deactivated.
Maintenance is still is progress for the remaining ones.

Aug 31, 07:43 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [GRA][Network] - Rack GRA0316B05B
item.description:
Sep 8, 15:59 UTC
Update - Update : Curative maintenance will be performed today from 21:00 UTC to 22:00 UTC.
Only customers who have not configured LACP will be impacted during the maintenance.

We will keep you informed of the progress of the maintenance.

Sep 8, 09:03 UTC
Identified - Start time : 07/09/2022 09:23 UTC
Service impact : Impacted customers may observed additional delay for actions.
Root cause : Network device malfunction
Ongoing actions : A fix should be be deployed on 08/09/2022 21:00 UTC.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
